Otaku.com has the MF4 Soundtrack for sale!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Monster Farm 4 (Spoilers!): Reviews, Information on Gameplay, Etc. : Otaku.com has the MF4 Soundtrack for sale!
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, October 7, 2003 - 10:57 am:

The MR Soundtracks have been hard to find in the US in the past, but it looks like otaku.com now has both the MF2 and MF4 soundtracks in stock. You can view the MF4 box HERE. To see both, simply go to the website, select 'game music', then the letter M and the second page therein.
